      • getClosestAABB

        Vec2D[] getClosestAABB(Vec2D pos)
        Return a sufficiently large AABB closest to pos in array {pos,size}
        Parameters:
        pos - Position to find the AABB next to (usually center of an AABB about to be tested against world)
        Returns:
        {pos,size} of world AABB for this point
